meanings.definition: The activity of skiing on remote, untouched slopes accessed by helicopter.
meanings.sent1: Heliskiing is a thrilling adventure that allows skiers to explore untouched snow.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of experiencing the excitement of heliskiing in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends decided to try heliskiing for the first time and ended up having a blast.
meanings.sent4: The idea of heliskiing seemed like a magical journey through the snowy wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the helicopter rotor blades signaled the start of their heliskiing expedition.

meanings.definition: To participate in the sport of skiing on backcountry terrain reached by helicopter.
meanings.sent1: She loves to heliski in the mountains during winter.
meanings.sent2: They plan to heliski in the remote areas next weekend.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly suggested heliskiing to work instead of driving.
meanings.sent4: The skier's movements were as graceful as a bird heliskiing down the slopes.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of heliskiing down the mountain was an unforgettable experience for them.
